body.name: Noctua NH-L9x65 chromax.Black, Premium Low-Profile CPU Cooler (65mm, Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 31 mins
features: Award-winning, compact low-profile cooler with only 65mm total height – ideal for HTPCs, ITX and Small Form Factor (SFF) builds, now available in an all-black design!
95x95mm footprint lets the cooler stay clear of the RAM or PCIe slots on current motherboards and guarantees easy access to near-socket connectors for hassle-free assembly and maintenance
Highly optimised NF-A9x14 slim 92mm fan with PWM support and Low-Noise Adaptor for automatic speed control and ultra-quiet operation
Includes high-end NT-H1 thermal paste and SecuFirm2 mounting system for easy installation on Intel LGA1851, LGA1700, LGA1200, LGA115x and AMD AM5 & AM4 (offset mounting option for best efficiency)
Recommended for CPUs with low to moderate heat dissipation (see CPU compatibility list), e.g. Intel 14900K, 14700K, 14600K or AMD Ryzen 7950X3D, 7900X3D, 7800X3D, 7700 etc.
body.description: Cooler Specifications Please Note The NH-L9x65 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in Small Form Factor cases and mini-ITX environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and/or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery Black NH-L9x65 heatsinkNF-A9x14 HS-PWM chromax.black premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundBlack SecuFirm2 mounting kitNoctua metal case-badge

productInformation.name: Material
productInformation.value: Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The NH-L9x65 chromax.black is an all-black version of the award-winning NH-L9x65 low-profile cooler, which covers a middle ground between the larger NH-L12 series and the ultra-compact NH-L9i and NH-L9a series. With 65 instead of 37mm height and four instead of two heatpipes, the NH-L9x65 is more powerful than its smaller siblings yet retains the NH-L9i’s 95x95mm footprint, which not only ensures 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility on current motherboards but also makes the cooler more convenient to work with as it doesn’t overhang near-socket connectors. Thanks to the highly optimised NF-A9x14 premium fan that supports fully automatic speed control via PWM, the NH-L9x65 runs remarkably quiet. Topped off with the professional SecuFirm2 multi-socket mounting system for Intel and AMD and Noctua’s renowned NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-L9x65 fuses everything users have come to expect from Noctua’s larger coolers into a compact premium package for space restricted systems.

65mm low profile Due to its compact heatsink and the 14mm thin NF-A9x14 low profile fan, the NH-L9x65 stands only 65mm tall (the same height as low-profile expansion cards), which makes it ideal for use in compact HTPCs or Small Form Factor cases that offer limited clearance for CPU coolers. 100% RAM compatibility With its compact 95x95mm footprint, the NH-L9x65 does not overhang the RAM slots on Intel LGA1851/LGA1700/ LGA1200/LGA115x and AMD AM5/AM4 based motherboards, which ensures easy access to the modules and 100% compatibility with DIMMs that feature tall heat-spreaders or RGB lighting. 100% compatibility with PCIe cards on mini-ITX Many mini-ITX motherboards have the PCIe slot sitting close to the socket zone. While larger coolers that exceed this zone are likely to block the PCIe slot, the 95x95mm sized NH-L9x65 provides full compatibility with PCIe cards, be it on ATX, microATX or ITX. NT-H1 thermal compound Noctua’s much-acclaimed NT-H1 is a pro-grade TIM solution that provides minimum thermal resistance, excellent ease of use and outstanding reliability. Chosen again and again by overclockers and enthusiast users worldwide, it has established itself as a benchmark for premium-quality thermal compounds.

Measurements Height (without fan): 51mm Width (without fan): 95mm Depth (without fan): 95mm Height (with fan): 65mm Width (with fan): 95mm Depth (with fan): 95mm Weight (without fan): 340g Weight (with fan/s): 413g Materials Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating Cooler Specifications Please Note The NH-L9x65 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in Small Form Factor cases and mini-ITX environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and/or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery Black NH-L9x65 heatsinkNF-A9x14 HS-PWM chromax.black premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundBlack SecuFirm2 mounting kitNoctua metal case-badge

chromax.black design The NH-L9x65 chromax.black is black from head to toe: featuring a black coated heatsink, a black fan with black anti-vibration pads, black fan clips and black mounting parts, it’s right at home in all-black builds and easy to integrate with other colour schemes.

NH-L9x65 NH-L9x65 chromax.black LGA1851, LGA1700 ✓ ✓ LGA1200, LGA115x (LGA1150, LGA1151, LGA1155, LGA1156) ✓ ✓ LGA20xx Square ILM with NM-i20xx with NM-i20xx LGA20xx Narrow ILM X X LGA4189 X X LGA4677 X X AM5 ✓ ✓ AM4 ✓ ✓ TR4, SP3, sTRX4, sWRX8 X X sTR5, SP6 X X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect replacement for a failed AIO
reviews.reviewText: When my AIO finally failed, I made the decision to stop using them. After a little research, I decided on the Noctua NH-L9x65 air cooler. I did not want one of the 6+" high-TDP air coolers since no matter how black they make them, they still look terrible. With my AIO, using Handbrake to convert a video resulted in CPU (i5-8600K) temps of around 85c. A little high, but acceptable. With the NH-L9x65, my Handbrake test showed a max CPU core temp of 64c at 95% CPU utilization. Perfect.Installation was very easy and the instructions clearly written. Noctua includes both the thermal compound and a screwdriver.I'm very happy with this product and it looks great in the case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another stellar cooler from Noctua
reviews.reviewText: Yet another reliable cooler that gets the job done, except this time it looks super nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quietly Gets On With It
reviews.reviewText: A well-designed heatsink, doing a great job on an AMD Ryzen 7 7700X processor, which is driving a 4k monitor at 4k resolution with no graphics card. CPU temps hover at 50C, as the BIOS controls the fan speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not strong enough for a 5600x
reviews.reviewText: Thought this cooler would be enough for the 5600x but unfortunately it is not. Getting into the mid 70’s while gaming. Took it off and re did the thermal compound and no change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps a 5600x 3d cool in a fractual terra case
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my 5600x3d cool in the small fractual terra case. Had a smaller cooler but this performs much better than that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shocked that this failed
reviews.reviewText: I installed this on a Core i7 14700K processor with some Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut. I don't know if I got a dud or not but my processor jumped to 88C and then over 95C from idle (in bios) to playing COD. If neve shut down but boy was it heating the house.I needed a LP cooler and I have used this cooler on several different AM5 & 12th-14th Gen processors and never had this issue before. Is it a dud? I do not know. I installed a Deep Cool unit that I use for testing and it dropped temps to 40C idle and 67C while playing Warzone @ 144p on high settings.Better luck with the new Noctua cooler i just bought.p.s. I have to usea 92mm Profile fan. I am using a ITX case for this build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and fast shipper
reviews.reviewText: They worked like a charm. Fast shipper smooth transaction. Very well made easy to install I have ordered 4 other ones..

reviews.reviewTitle: C'è tutto e funziona alla grande
reviews.reviewText: In dotazione anche la pasta per il raffreddamento, viti, braccetti, eccetera per il montaggio. Bello da vedere, e compatto. Solido. E c'era pure l'adesivo metallico in dotazione, sanno proprio come farci felici :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product itself is perfect. One of the rib is kinda loose which might be because of shipping. It came long way to me in just product box. No extra protection which might be dangerous.
